name: Wild Herbs
description: Common medicinal herbs gathered from village gardens, useful for remedies and cooking.

name: Craft Tools
description: Quality tools essential for various trades and repairs, valued by craftsmen.

name: Climbing Rope
description: Strong hemp rope essential for mountain climbing and securing loads on treacherous paths.

name: Climbing Harness
description: Professional climbing harness required for the most dangerous mountain routes and mining work.

name: Oil Lantern
description: Reliable oil lantern essential for navigating dark passages and underground areas.

name: Resin Torch
description: Simple resin torch providing basic illumination for short journeys through dark areas.

name: Navigation Compass
description: Precision compass essential for wilderness navigation and preventing dangerous detours.

name: Celestial Charts
description: Advanced navigation charts required for deep sea voyages and ocean exploration.

name: Weather Cloak
description: Heavy-duty cloak providing protection against harsh weather on exposed routes.

name: Mountain Survival Kit
description: Complete mountain survival kit combining weather protection and climbing safety equipment.

name: Ferry Pass
description: Official ferry pass granting access to water transport routes and maritime services.

name: Maritime License
description: Advanced maritime license required for deep sea voyages and exotic island trade.

name: Load Harness
description: Professional load distribution harness enabling efficient transport of heavy cargo.

name: Noble Seal
description: Official noble seal granting access to high-society contracts and exclusive trading opportunities.

name: Trade Credentials
description: Official merchant credentials enabling access to professional trade caravans and commercial contracts.

name: Vintage Wine
description: Fine vintage wine highly valued in port cities and trading posts, fragile but profitable.

name: Exotic Spices
description: Rare spices from distant islands, extremely valuable in inland markets but expensive to acquire.

name: Mountain Iron
description: High-quality iron ore from mountain mines, essential for advanced weapon and tool crafting.

name: Precious Gems
description: Ancient gems discovered in forgotten ruins, extremely valuable to collectors and nobles.

name: Lost Relic
description: Mysterious artifact from a lost civilization, incredibly valuable to scholars and collectors.

name: Fishing Nets
description: Quality fishing nets valued by coastal communities and fishing operations.

name: Master Tools
description: Exceptional tools forged from mountain iron, essential for the most demanding crafting projects.

name: Fine Silk
description: Luxurious silk cloth from exotic lands, highly prized by nobles and wealthy merchants.

name: Trail Provisions
description: Essential provisions for long journeys, reducing stamina costs during extended travel.
